alert.note: Alert for Blue Earth; Brown; Nicollet (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 16 at 9:01PM CDT until further notice by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Wisconsin and Minnesota... Mississippi River near Hastings L/D 2 affecting Dakota, Washington, Pierce and Goodhue Counties. ...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers in Minnesota... Cottonwood River Above Springfield affecting Brown County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Minnesota... Mississippi River at St. Cloud affecting Sherburne, Stearns and Wright Counties. Redwood River near Redwood Falls affecting Redwood County. Minnesota River At New Ulm affecting Brown, Blue Earth and Nicollet Counties. Minnesota River At Morton affecting Redwood and Renville Counties. Minnesota River at Montevideo affecting Lac qui Parle, Chippewa and Yellow Medicine Counties. Sauk River at St. Cloud affecting Stearns County. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Minnesota River At New Ulm. * WHEN...Until further notice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 845 PM CDT Monday, the stage was 801.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 845 PM CDT Monday was 801.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 803.5 feet early Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 800.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 804.2 feet on 09/29/2010. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
